meanings.definition: A three-dimensional image formed by the interference of light beams from a laser or other coherent light source.
meanings.sent1: The holograms at the science museum looked so real!
meanings.sent2: She was amazed by the holograms of animals in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the holograms on the wall.
meanings.sent4: His memories felt like holograms, vivid and tangible.
meanings.sent5: The holograms of the dancers seemed to leap off the stage.

meanings.definition: A technique for creating three-dimensional images by recording the interference pattern of a split laser beam on a photographic plate.
meanings.sent1: The artist used holograms to make his artwork stand out.
meanings.sent2: The scientist explained the process of creating holograms in detail.
meanings.sent3: The students were puzzled by the holograms on their assignment.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams felt like holograms, complex and layered.
meanings.sent5: The holograms on the screen mesmerized the audience.
